biotools.summary:
Powerful rare variant association testing in a copula-based joint analysis of multiple phenotypes.

Copula-Based Joint Analysis of Multiple Phenotypes.

We provide a computationally efficient and robust implementation of the recently proposed C-JAMP (Copula-based Joint Analysis of Multiple Phenotypes) method (Konigorski et al., 2019, submitted)

bioschemas.name: C-JAMP
